chapter_title: Book design by Brenda E. Angelilli and Deena Fleming (Part 2)
overall_mood: Tense and Suspenseful, with undertones of Redemption and Forgiveness

scenes.text_segment: He needed to get warm and dry immediately, and the nearest place he could was the room he was trying to break into...
scenes.visual_prompt: Cinematic shot, low angle, dim lighting, rain-soaked window in the foreground, Kavik in the background, shivering and desperate, camera zooms in slowly to his grim determination.

scenes.text_segment: With a burst of desperation, Kavik brought his hands up and melted a small portal...
scenes.visual_prompt: Close-up shot, focus on Kavik's hands, steam rising as he melts the ice, wide angle, showing him squeezing through a small opening.

scenes.text_segment: The first thing he did was whip the water off himself like it was a cloud of mosquito-leeches...
scenes.visual_prompt: Medium shot, Kavik standing, water droplets flying off, his expression relieved but alert, room dimly lit with a large oil lamp in the background.

audio_cues.description: sound of the oil lamp igniting

scenes.text_segment: He was in the poshest quarters of the Blue Manse, that much was obvious...
scenes.visual_prompt: Wide shot, opulent room with rich wooden furniture, continental trees, foreign wool rugs, and decorative plants, camera pans slowly to emphasize luxury.

audio_cues.description: soft ambient hum of a quiet room
sound of pages turning on the desk

scenes.text_segment: The door opened. He lowered the scroll. A girl, about sixteen or seventeen like him, walked in with her eyes closed...
scenes.visual_prompt: Medium shot, focus on the door opening, girl in layered robes enters, her hair flowing with unseen wind, camera zooms in on her face.

audio_cues.description: gentle wind blowing, despite being indoors

scenes.text_segment: Spirits above, she wasn’t kidding. The Avatar’s airbending-powered cry hurt Kavik’s ears...
scenes.visual_prompt: Close-up shot, Kavik covering his ears, oil lamp flickers out, camera shakes slightly to emphasize the power of the scream.

audio_cues.description: oil lamp going out with a puff

scenes.text_segment: The plan was to ignore the cold for now and break his fall with a liquefied section of the Blue Manse...
scenes.visual_prompt: Dynamic shot, high-angle, Kavik splashing through ice, camera follows him as he falls and molds ice to cushion his descent.

scenes.text_segment: He took another right, then a left, and a right again. Only when he was sure he hadn’t been tailed...
scenes.visual_prompt: Tracking shot, Kavik moving stealthily through dark alleys, camera following closely, shadows and flickering streetlights creating tension.

scenes.text_segment: It turned out Kavik’s punishment was pretty basic. It started with a regular old beating...
scenes.visual_prompt: Close-up shot, dimly lit basement, Kavik curled on the floor, guards' boots visible, dynamic camera movement to convey impact.

audio_cues.description: sound of a fist hitting flesh

scenes.text_segment: Kavik’s mother tried to sink to her knees but Yangchen quickly put a stop to it, propping her up...
scenes.visual_prompt: Medium shot, warm lighting, Avatar Yangchen gently helping Kavik's mother stand, sincerity in her expression, family in the background.
